front.title: ISO/IEC/IEEE International Standard for Telecommunications and exchange between information technology systems--Requirements for local and metropolitan area networks--Part 1AR:Secure device identity

author.organization: Institute of Electrical and Electronics Engineers

front.abstract: A Secure Device Identifier (DevID) is cryptographically bound to a device and supports authentication of the device's identity. An Initial Device Identifier (IDevID) provided by the supplier of a device can be supplemented by Local Device Identifiers (LDevIDs) facilitating enrollment (provisioning of authentication and authorization credentials) by local network administrators.
